ul.li: Marmor pisanum de honore bisellij : parergon inseritur de veterum sellis : synopsis appenditur de re donatica antiquorum quam breui spondet / auctor Val. Chimentellius i.c. in pisano lyceo eloq. & politic. professor ; accedit Myiodia, siue, De muscis odoris pisanis epistola.

Marmor Pisanum de honore bisellii [microform] : Parergon inseritur de veterum sellis : synopsis appenditur de re donatica antiquorum quam breui spondet / auctor Val. Chimentellius ... ; accedit Myiodia, siue de muscis odoris Pisanis epistola.
